title: Plural in Brazilian Portuguese Nouns - Nouns Lesson

media:group.media:title: Plural in Brazilian Portuguese Nouns - Nouns Lesson
media:group.media:description:
In this class, you will learn about Plural in Brazilian Portuguese nouns. Learn the general rule and also the plural of words ending in R, Z, S, M, L and ÃO.

Chapters:
0:00 - Introduction
0:09 - Basic Principles and General Rule 
1:44 - Words ending in R
2:08 - Words ending in Z
2:33 - Words ending in S
3:48 - Words ending in M
4:12 - Words ending in L
6:26 - Words ending in Ão
7:22 - Topics not covered and Conclusion
